VIAJE_GUIADO, RUTAS_POSIBLES, PARADAS_IN: Guided trip, possible routes, intermediate stops, voice instructions.
VER_EL_MAPA_CENTRADO_EN_TU_POSICIÓN_Y_UB: View the map centered on your position and place the camera behind you.
GESTOS_PARA_DESPLAZAR,_ROTAR,_ZOOM_Y_ALI: Gestures to move, rotate, zoom and 3D alignment.
PUEDES_BUSCAR_DESTINOS_PARA_TUS_VIAJES_D: You can search for destinations for your trips in the following ways:
SELECCIONANDO_UN_PUNTO_EN_EL_MAPA_(MANTE: Selecting a point on the map (hold down).
UTILIZA_LOS_AJUSTES_DEL_MAPA_Y_NAVEGACIÓ: Use the map and navigation settings to customize the interface.
12_DISEÑOS_DEL_MAPA,_3D_Y_2D,_DÍA_/_TARD: 12 map designs, 3D and 2D, day / afternoon / night.
RECIBE_ALERTAS_DE_VOZ_EN_TIEMPO_REAL_PAR: Receive real-time voice alerts to assist you when driving. Alerts are an important aid to help you achieve the monthly goal of 0 faults and earn the reward.
TODOS_LOS_MESES_SE_GENERA_CON_PARTE_DE_L: Every month, part of the subscription income generates an accumulated pool in $USD.
AL_CULMINAR_EL_MES_SE_REPARTE_EN_PARTES_: At the end of the month, it is equally distributed among all subscribers who meet the established requirements:
AL_MENOS_1000_KM_RECORRIDOS_DURANTE_EL_M: At least 1000 km traveled during the month
0_FALTA_REGISTRADA_EN_LA_APP_DURANTE_EL_: 0 faults recorded in the app during the month
OBJECTIVE: The objective: Reduce accidents and promote road safety.
HOW: How? Through monthly monetary rewards to responsible drivers
FIND_DETAILS: Find details about prizes and requirements in the menu
APP_ASSIST: The app will assist you while driving without needing to register.
PARTICIPATE_REWARDS: If you want to participate in the monthly rewards you must:
STEP2: 2- Reach the minimum kilometers traveled each month.
STEP3: 3- Do not record speeding or other violations in the app during the month.
THANK_YOU: Thank you for participating in this beta and helping to improve Iron Street for its launch.
FEEDBACK_IMPORTANCE: Your feedback on this version is vital to the project.
